'''Memories''' are [[Constellation Activation Material]] items used to activate the [[Constellations]] of the [[Traveler]]'s different elements.

==Types==
{{Items by Category List|Memories}}

==Trivia==
* The sources for [[Memory of Roving Gales]] and [[Memory of Immovable Crystals]] do not include [[Statues of the Seven]], while later ones do. This is corresponds with Statues of the Seven outside of [[Mondstadt]] and [[Liyue]] not increasing the maximum [[Stamina]] of [[Character]]s.
